title: Generate International Shipping Documents
description: An order is being shipped internationally and requires a commercial invoice and customs declaration.

tasks.description: Retrieve the sales order and verify all product details, including country of origin and HS codes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all necessary customs information is present on the order.

tasks.description: Generate the commercial invoice based on the order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the commercial invoice document.

tasks.description: Complete and print the required customs declaration form (e.g., CN22/23).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the appropriate customs form for the destination country.
